origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicIndicatorAPI.get_report', 'description': 'This function retrieves the latest economic indicators report for a specified country.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'country', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The country for which to retrieve the economic indicators.'}, {'name': 'indicator', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'Comma-separated list of economic indicators to include in the report.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the latest values for the specified economic indicators.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicIndicatorAPI.get_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'country'是'United States', 'indicator'是'GDP,Inflation,Unemployment'.
